name: generic-copilot-providers
description: An extension that integrates OpenAI Compatible Inference Providers into GitHub Copilot Chat

commands.title: GenericCopilot: Set Generic Compatible Multi-Provider Apikey

key.description: Canonical provider key (lowercase, used as owned_by and for API key storage).

baseUrl.description: Base URL for the provider's API endpoint.

headers.description: (Optional) Custom HTTP headers to include in requests to this provider.

generic-copilot.providers.description: A list of provider configurations. Models can reference providers to inherit baseUrl

provider.description: (Required) Reference to a provider key. Allows inheriting key and baseURL and headers

configId.description: (Optional) Configuration ID for this model. Allows defining the same model with different settings (e.g. 'glm-4.6::thinking', 'glm-4.6::no-thinking').

model_properties.description: (Optional) Model properties including context_length, family, owned_by, etc.

context_length.description: Model support context length. Default is 128000.

family.description: (Optional) Model family (e.g., 'gpt-4', 'claude-3', 'gemini'). Enables model-specific optimizations and behaviors. Defaults to 'generic' if not specified.

model_parameters.description: (Optional) Model parameters including temperature, max_tokens, reasoning settings, etc.

temperature.description: Sampling temperature (range: [0, 2]). Lower values make output more deterministic, higher values make it more creative. Default is 1.

max_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate (range: [1, context_length)). Default is 4096.

max_completion_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate (OpenAI new standard parameter).

type.description: Set to 'enabled' to enable thinking, 'disabled' to disable thinking

thinking_budget.description: Maximum number of tokens for chain-of-thought output. Primarily respected by anthropic models.

effort.description: Reasoning effort level for OpenRouter/xAI (high, medium, low, minimal, auto)

exclude.description: Exclude reasoning tokens from the final response

max_tokens.description: Specific token limit for reasoning (Anthropic-style, alternative to effort)

enabled.description: Enable reasoning (inferred from effort or max_tokens if not specified)

extra.description: Extra request parameters that will be used in /chat/completions.

enabled.description: Enable retry mechanism for api errors. Default is true.

max_attempts.description: Maximum number of retry attempts. Default is 3.

interval_ms.description: Interval between retry attempts in milliseconds. Default is 1000 (1 seconds).

generic-copilot.retry.description: Retry configuration for handling api errors like [429, 500, 502, 503, 504].

generic-copilot.delay.description: Fixed delay in milliseconds between consecutive requests. Default is 0 (no delay).

scripts.download-api: npx dts dev && mv vscode.proposed.*.ts src
scripts.compile: tsc -p ./ && cd webview-ui && npm run compile
scripts.package: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && vsce package --out generic-copilot-providers.vsix
